snippet: WYMAN--Jean, 82, of Boca Raton, FL, died on April 24, 2016 of natural causes. Born Jean Cohn in Longbranch, NJ, April 16, 1934 to Al and Rose Cohn, sister to Muriel and Jerry, wife of Stanley Wyman. Survived by her children Gary, Myles and Karen, grandchildren Benjamin, Alexander, Jack and Mylie. A woman of impeccable style, the original personal shopper in the fashion industry, her greatest wealth, her children and grandchildren. High heels forever! 1/3
lead_paragraph: WYMAN--Jean, 82, of Boca Raton, FL, died on April 24, 2016 of natural causes. Born Jean Cohn in Longbranch, NJ, April 16, 1934 to Al and Rose Cohn, sister to Muriel and Jerry, wife of Stanley Wyman. Survived by her children Gary, Myles and Karen, grandchildren Benjamin, Alexander, Jack and Mylie. A woman of impeccable style, the original personal shopper in the fashion industry, her greatest wealth, her children and grandchildren. High heels forever! 1/3
